= Bot Status = {{velocity}} ## -------------------------------------- ## Handle action specified in the Request ## -------------------------------------- #set ($botManager = $services.ircbot) #if ($request.action == "start") #set ($discard = $botManager.start(true)) #elseif ($request.action == "stop") #set ($discard = $botManager.stop(true)) #end ## ----------------- ## Display any error ## ----------------- #set ($error = $botManager.getLastError()) #if ("$!error" != "") {{error}}$error.message{{/error}} #end ## ------------------ ## Display Bot Status ## ------------------ #if ($botManager.isStarted()) #set($buttonText = "Stop the IRC Bot") #set ($action = "stop") Status: (% style='color:green' %)Bot is started.(%%) #else #set($buttonText = "Start the IRC Bot") #set ($action = "start") Status: (% style='color:red' %)Bot is not started.(%%) #end ## ---------------------------------- ## Display form to start/stop the Bot ## ---------------------------------- {{html}}
{{/html}} ## ------------------------- ## Display Bot Configuration ## ------------------------- The following configuration is used: #set ($ircconfigdoc = $xwiki.getDocument('IRC.IRCConfiguration')) #set ($discard = $ircconfigdoc.use($doc.fullName)) * Server: {{box}}$ircconfigdoc.getValue('server'){{/box}} * Channel: {{box}}$ircconfigdoc.getValue('channel'){{/box}} * Bot name: {{box}}$ircconfigdoc.getValue('botname'){{/box}} To modify the configuration, go to the [[IRC Configuration page>>IRC.IRCConfiguration]]. {{/velocity}} = Available Bot Listeners = A Bot listener allows to add features to the IRC channel (such as logging messages in the wiki, searching the wiki directly from IRC, etc). {{velocity}} (% id="listenertable" %) |=Name|=Description|=Is started? #set ($statuses = $botManager.getBotListenerStatuses()) #foreach ($status in $statuses.keySet()) #if ($status.isWikiBotListener()) #set ($nameColumn = "[[$status.name>>$status.id]]") #else #set ($nameColumn = $status.name) #end |$nameColumn|$status.description|#if ($statuses.get($status) == "true")(/)#else(x)#end #end {{/velocity}}
